name: Sky Puzzles
description:
MENU CONTROLS: W & S to change option and enter to select it!

Sky puzzles it's a 3D game inspired by the classic Kula World and some other puzzle games.

The main point of the game it's activate all the platforms to go through the levels.

This game has been made on a personal game a week challenge and it's the ninth game made.

Enjoy!

Music & sound effects

Menu validation: http://freesound.org/people/broumbroum/sounds/5056...
Menu select: http://freesound.org/people/broumbroum/sounds/5056...

Menu music : http://freesound.org/people/B_Lamerichs/sounds/266...
Ingame music: http://freesound.org/people/B_Lamerichs/sounds/266...
